name: Divine Favor
description_1: You grant the favor of your god to a target within near. On their next damage roll, roll with advantage.

name: Purify Food and Drink
description_1: With a touch, food and drink becomes consumable again to grant nurishment. Removes poison and rot from food and drink.

name: Aid
description_1: You bolster the resolve of a target within near. For the spell's duration the target gains 4 temporary hitpoints and advantage on morale checks.

name: Prayer
description_1: Upon citing a prayer to your god grants blessings to you and your allies while also condemning those who stand against you.
description_2: Allies within near gain advantage on their next attack roll or spell check.
description_3: Enemies within near gain disadvantage on their next attack roll or spell check.

name: Smite
description_1: You call down punishing flames on a creature you can see within range. It takes 2d6 damage.

name: Flamestrike
description_1: You call down a holy pillar of fire, immolating one creature you can see within range. The target takes 3d6 damage.

name: Adhesive
description_1: You conjure forth a thick, sticky substance on the ground. All creatures within close of the target area must make a DC12 dexterity check or be unable to move for the spell's duration.
description_2: Upon stepping on to the substance the same check is needed in order not to become stuck.

name: Chilling Touch
description_1: Your hand forms a layer of ice as you reach out. Touching a target deals 1d4 damage. Additionally the target must make a DC12 constitution check or become weakened.

name: Air Walk
description_1: You begin to walk on air as if it's solid as the ground. You walk at half speed and are unable to run while the spell is maintained.

name: False Life
description_1: Incantations bolster your physical form. Roll a number of d4s equal to half your level (rounded down) and apply that as temporary hit points for the spell's duration.
